languages.text: "От символа еще исходит цвет, похожий на... кровь, смешанную с молоком. Это должно тревожить, но почему на душе так спокойно?"
"This symbol... I can still see the colours emanating from it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"
languages.original_text: "От символа еще исходит цвет, похожий на... кровь, смешанную с молоком. Это должно тревожить, но почему на душе так спокойно?"

traits.locale_text: "This symbol — I can still see the colours emanating it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"
"This symbol — I can still see the colours emanating it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"

"This symbol... I can still see the colours emanating from it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"

languages.text: « Ce symbole... Je vois encore les couleurs qui en émanent, un peu comme... du sang mélangé à du lait. J'imagine que c'est censé être un signe inquiétant, mais... je me sens étrangement calme. »
languages.original_text: "This symbol... I can still see the colours emanating from it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"

traits.locale_text: « Ce symbole... Je vois encore les couleurs qui en émanent, un peu comme... du sang mélangé à du lait. J'imagine que c'est censé être un signe inquiétant, mais... je me sens étrangement calme. »

languages.text: «Este símbolo... todavía veo los colores que desprende. Es como... leche mezclada con sangre. Debería resultar siniestro, peor... ¿por qué estoy tan tranquila?».
languages.original_text: "This symbol... I can still see the colours emanating from it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"

traits.locale_text: «Este símbolo... todavía veo los colores que desprende. Es como... leche mezclada con sangre. Debería resultar siniestro, peor... ¿por qué estoy tan tranquila?».

languages.text: 「このシンボル…まだ色が見えます、そうまるで…血とミルクを混ぜたような色。不吉な光景のはずなのに…どうしてこれほど心が落ち着くのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "This symbol... I can still see the colours emanating from it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"

traits.locale_text: 「このシンボル…まだ色が見えます、そうまるで…血とミルクを混ぜたような色。不吉な光景のはずなのに…どうしてこれほど心が落ち着くのでしょう？」

languages.text: “这个符号……我依然能看到它散发出的颜色，就好像……鲜血与牛奶混合在一起一样。这本该是个不祥的预兆……可我为什么感觉如此平静？”
languages.original_text: "This symbol... I can still see the colours emanating from it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"

traits.locale_text: “这个符号……我依然能看到它散发出的颜色，就好像……鲜血与牛奶混合在一起一样。这本该是个不祥的预兆……可我为什么感觉如此平静？”

languages.text: "Dieses Symbol ... Ich sehe noch die Farben daraus hervortreten, wie ... Blut, vermischt mit Milch. Das sollte ein beunruhigender Anblick sein ... aber warum bleibe ich dann so ruhig?"
languages.original_text: "This symbol... I can still see the colours emanating from it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Symbol ... Ich sehe noch die Farben daraus hervortreten, wie ... Blut, vermischt mit Milch. Das sollte ein beunruhigender Anblick sein ... aber warum bleibe ich dann so ruhig?"

languages.text: "Bu sembol... Saçtığı renkleri hâlâ görebiliyorum... Kanla karışık süte benziyor. Fena bir alamettir de... Neden bu kadar sakinim?"
languages.original_text: "This symbol... I can still see the colours emanating from it, akin to... blood mixed with milk. It should be a foreboding sight... but then why do I feel so calm?"
